DOC.brief_summary: An investigational drug ( MK0677 ) study determine whether helps memory cognition patient Alzheimer 's Disease .
DOC.brief_title: Study MK0677 Treatment Alzheimer 's Disease ( 0677-030 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Patients must probable Alzheimer 's disease mild moderate severity . A brain scan laboratory result must consistent Alzheimer 's disease . The patient must otherwise medically healthy .
